REPORT THIS TRANSLATE

ABOUT US

The problem? Reporting a problem to your local council/authorities is too long and contains many barriers. The idea? A platform to make reliable and instant reports. The solution? ReportThis.

ReportThis is a web platform that’s built for community members to make instant reports to their local councils. This application is designed with minimal features that make the user experience journey seamless for everyone.

Personally, a problem I’ve encountered many times many times when visiting any government agency website is the enormous cluster of information that you’re bombarded with. Not being concise with the delivery of information is an intentional design feature often embedded in government agency sites.
